website_summaries.verdict: Made of breathable polyester, this reflective shirt for men comes from one of the biggest names in work gear.
pros: This comfortable shirt complies with ANSI requirements
Sizes available for big and tall men
cons: The size is too large for some
Consult the sizing chart for best fit

customer_reviews.title: Usually great shirts, just a fluke this time....
customer_reviews.text: I have bought multiple shirts at a time these on multiple occasions for work, and have never been disappointed - until this time...having received them, I removed all the stickers/tags and marked them with an approximate purchase date so I can keep track of how long I've had them/how many times they'd been washed (effects the reflectivity)...when I went to put the first one on for work, I found out that it was WAY TOO SMALL...it had the correct size marked on it, but it was not the correct size...like I said, just a fluke...I will buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Big guy

customer_reviews.title: Best fit yet
customer_reviews.text: The stripes are super flexible not like most sewn stripes. Shirt pocket is important to me. I got them in long sleeve also. It about all I wear to work cause it’s to hot for a vest. Buy me!
customer_reviews.author: P. S. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shirts every day for 6 years doing utility work they are fantastic durable and with minimal fading. Best shirt for hot weather road work
customer_reviews.author: Smokeeater406

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I bought was XLT, it was actually too big. It fit like a 2X but it had the perfect length, I needed a slimmer fit so I got the LT n it's perfect. Bought 3 more long sleeves n one short sleeve, GONNA WEAR EM TIL THEY FALL APART HAHA😎
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great work shirts for people working in the heat
customer_reviews.text: These shirts have been just what my husband needed. He works in the hot sun and is moving pretty fast. The shirt wicks away sweat and you can feel the comfortable breeze blowing through. Best buy we have made in a while!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Great High Viz
customer_reviews.text: Great for jobs that require high viz , an I love the fabric it absorb sweat better than the way cotton feel does
customer_reviews.author: John Vega

customer_reviews.title: Worth ordering
customer_reviews.text: Shirts are probably the best I’ve found. Ordering a few more this week. I work outside in heat & it kept me cool. Also the length is outstanding. Hard to find shirts that are of great length
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I’ve made working as a highway inspector. They keep u cool and beats wearing a bulky safety vest !! really happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Edward gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Reduces the need for a vest on top of a tee shirt in this hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Yadon

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little big
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Fits a little big. I'm 6' and weigh 250. Normally wear a 2X, but the XL Tall fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These work shirts are great, but they run a little short in my opinion especially if your man has any kind of belly. We went with extra large tall and my husband weighs about 240 pounds. I normally buy him 2X shirts but you don’t need to in this one. Perfect. Go tall even if your man isn’t tall.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have to get dirty in your work they are good shirts
customer_reviews.text: If you really have to get down and dirty with your work the shirts will become stained very fast, they will also start to come unraveled,had mine a month now and feel like I should not have bought them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Carhartt Big and Tall Men's Big & Tall Force High Visibility Short Sleeve Class 2 T-Shirt
product_meta.description: Men at work will get the job done in this shirt. Sweat wicking, its 3m scotch lite reflective material - 5510 comfort trim - is segmented for superior breathability and durability. Made from 4.25-ounce, 100 percent polyester knit, it offers fast dry technology that wicks away sweat for comfort, stain breaker technology which releases stains, the comfort of a rib-knit crewneck collar and tagless label, convenient left-chest pocket for utility, side-seamed construction that minimizes twisting, durable trim that maintains its performance through 75 home launderings and it meets ANSI/I sea 107-2010. 3M and scotch lite are trademarks of 3M
feature_bullets: Fast dry technology wicks away sweat for comfort
ANSI class 2, level 2 compliant 3m scotch lite reflective material, segmented trim #5510 maintains performance through 75 home launderings
